entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of light snow. Periods of light snow over eastern sections this evening. Amount 5 cm over eastern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
